live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52713.summary: Some customers in Millstream area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We will be working to restore service as soon as power is restored to the area.
52713.title: Aug 21 -  | Victoria (Millstream) | All Services - Hydro Related Outage (Fix In Progress)
